comment: /**  * Prior to the fix for SPR-8761, this test threw because the nested MyComponent  * annotation was being falsely considered as a 'lite' Configuration class candidate.  */
code: /**  * Prior to the fix for SPR-8761, this test threw because the nested MyComponent  * annotation was being falsely considered as a 'lite' Configuration class candidate.  */ @Test public void repro() {     AnnotationConfigApplicationContext ctx = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext().     ctx.scan(getClass().getPackage().getName()).     ctx.refresh().     assertThat(ctx.containsBean("withNestedAnnotation"), is(true)). }
